divs: Sighting Details (you can type over theseinstructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). Sitting on porch waiting for my family. Saw the bright lights and thoughtit was alow airliner as it got closer I found out it was a group of ufos . I wasin awe before and after it happened.the objects were spining in circles. It spedoff after about 40 seconds.
